message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you be open to discussing this further?
Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your position, but $18,000 is my bottom line.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $15,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with $14,000 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
